attributes.action: To investigate how UK political system & culture were allowed to be subverted.
attributes.additional_details: To investigate how our political system and culture were allowed to be subverted by a foreign power (EU) with the consent of UK politicians and ensure it cannot happen again by amending/introducing primary legislation. Where evidence can  be found that identifies  criminal acts by politicians, officials and other citizens in relation to existing law, that evidence be provided to the police.
attributes.background:
Why are the 52% of the electorate being treated as though they lost the Brexit Referendum?
To investigate how our political system and culture were allowed to be subverted by a foreign power (EU) with the consent of UK politicians.

rejection.details:
The investigation of criminal acts is the responsibility of the police and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition setting out how you would like the law changed if that is something you would like to see happen.
